title: Vegan Lemon Curd
notes: Don't cut corners soaking the cashews, or the texture will suffer. It might be worth experimenting with more lemon juice and less water.
ingredients: 1 cup {cashews}, soaked for 3-8 hours, drained, and rinsed
steps: In a blender, combine the water and cashews until very smooth.
Pour the mixture into a saucepan and bring to a simmer, stirring constantly.
When thick, add the sugar, lemon juice, and zest. and cook for a few minutes until creamy.
Pour into a jar and refrigerate. It will thicken in the fridge.
